projects.title: DriveWise
projects.description: Developed a VR-based simulation system for driving students to practice and improve their driving skills. The system allows students to complete driving simulations, receive scores, and identify areas for improvement. Additionally, driving instructors can provide feedback on each lesson or simulation. The client-side was implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, while the server-side was developed with Node.js and SQL for data management. Integrated an external API to display weather conditions on the date of each lesson.

projects.title: KidiCare
projects.description: Developed a web-based application to help daycare educators manage children's personal needs efficiently. The system provides personalized child profiles, including allergies, emotional traits, and daily notes, ensuring a structured and organized environment. Built the client-side using React and JavaScript and the server-side with Node.js and Express, utilizing MongoDB for data storage.

projects.title: Netflix
projects.description: Developed a full-stack Netflix-like web application as part of a Web Infrastructure course project. Built the site based on a given Figma design, replicating core features of Netflix including category browsing, trailers, and a responsive interface. Implemented the frontend with React and the backend with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
